casebody.data:
Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Appellant
v.
Gina GIFFORD, as Personal Representative for Vincent Gifford, Decedent, Appellee No. 19 MAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Argued: December 5, 2018
Decided: February 20, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW , this 20 th day of February, 2019, the appeal is DISMISSED as moot.
